item.text: Now regarding the arrival of our Lord Jesus Christ and our being gathered to be with him, we ask you, brothers and sisters,

<st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> to be <st data-num="5030" class="">easily</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4531" class="">shaken</st> <st data-num="575">from</st> your <st data-num="3563" class="">composure</st> <st data-num="3366">or</st> <st data-num="2360" class="">disturbed</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> any kind of <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st> <st data-num="3383" class="">or</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">message</st> <st data-num="3383" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1992" class="">letter</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">allegedly</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5613">to the effect</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> is <st data-num="1764">already here</st>.

Let <st data-num="3361" class="">no</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">one</st> <st data-num="1818" class="">deceive</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3367" class="">any</st> <st data-num="5158" class="">way</st>. <st data-num="3754" class="">For</st> that day will <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">arrive</st> until the <st data-num="646" class="">rebellion</st> comes<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> of <st data-num="458" class="">lawlessness</st><n id="2" /> is <st data-num="601" class="">revealed</st>, the <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="684" class="">destruction</st>.<n id="3" />
He opposes and exalts himself above every so-called god or object of worship, and as a result he takes his seat in Godâ€™s temple, displaying himself as God.

<st data-num="3756">Surely</st> you <st data-num="3421" class="">recall</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">I</st> used to <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3778">these things</st> while I <st data-num="1510">was</st> <st data-num="2089" class="">still</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">so</st><n id="1" /> you <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> what <st data-num="2722" class="">holds</st> him <st data-num="2722" class="">back</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1519">so that</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> will be <st data-num="601" class="">revealed</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1438">his own</st> <st data-num="2540" class="">time</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="3466">hidden power</st> of <st data-num="458" class="">lawlessness</st><n id="1" /> is <st data-num="2235" class="">already</st> <st data-num="1754">at work</st>. <st data-num="3441">However</st>, the one who <st data-num="2722" class="">holds</st> him <st data-num="2722" class="">back</st><n id="2" /> will do so <st data-num="2193" class="">until</st> he <st data-num="1096" class="">is taken</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">out of</st> the <st data-num="3319">way</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5119" class="">then</st> the <st data-num="459">lawless one</st> will be <st data-num="601" class="">revealed</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="337" class="">destroy</st> by the <st data-num="4151" class="">breath</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4750" class="">mouth</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2673">wipe out</st> by the <st data-num="2015" class="">manifestation</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3952" class="">arrival</st>.

The <st data-num="3952" class="">arrival</st> of <st data-num="3739">the lawless one</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">by</st> <st data-num="4567">Satanâ€™s</st> <st data-num="1753" class="">working</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3956">all kinds</st> of <st data-num="1411" class="">miracles</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4592" class="">signs</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5579" class="">false</st> <st data-num="5059" class="">wonders</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every kind</st> of <st data-num="93" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="539" class="">deception</st> directed against<n id="1" /> those who are <st data-num="622" class="">perishing</st>, <st data-num="473" class="">because</st> they <st data-num="1209" class="">found</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> place in their <st data-num="26">hearts</st> for the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">so as to</st> be <st data-num="4982" class="">saved</st>.

<st data-num="1223 3778">Consequently</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="3992" class="">sends</st> on <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> a <st data-num="4106" class="">deluding</st> <st data-num="1753" class="">influence</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1519">so that</st> <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> will <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> what is <st data-num="5579" class="">false</st>.
And so all of them who have not believed the truth but have delighted in evil will be condemned.
But we ought to thank God always for you, brothers and sisters loved by the Lord, because God chose you from the beginning for salvation through sanctification by the Spirit and faith in the truth.

He <st data-num="2564" class="">called</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3739">this salvation</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st>, <st data-num="1519">so that</st> you may <st data-num="4047" class="">possess</st> the <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="686 3767">Therefore</st>, <st data-num="80">brothers and sisters</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4739">stand firm</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2902">hold on</st> to the <st data-num="3862" class="">traditions</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> we <st data-num="1321" class="">taught</st> you, <st data-num="1535" class="">whether</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">speech</st> <st data-num="1535" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> <st data-num="1992" class="">letter</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> may <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="846" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>, who <st data-num="25" class="">loved</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> us <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="3874" class="">comfort</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> <st data-num="1680" class="">hope</st>,
